overview: Kinky director Kevin Moore chronicles bad girls, illicit affairs and the ugly consequences of sexual sins in Creepy Blackmail. Justin blackmails the two-timing beauty into a twisted double penetration with himself and Xander. This scene is Brooklyn's very first on-camera DP. Finding mob goon Charles Dera assaulting her degenerate gambler fianc, blonde Latina Carmen Caliente agrees to the sadistic thug's blackmail.
title: Creepy Blackmail
